name: nested-localstorage
description: Enable nested object access in local storage. Browsers no longer throw exception when trying to write/read nested dictionary or object in local storage.

scripts.test: mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require mocha-jsdom --require mock-local-storage --require babel-polyfill --require babel-register

author: Melvin Koh <melvinkcx@gmail.com>
